long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time Flow – Your Simple, Offline Countdown Tool for Chrome

Ready to make the most of every second? Time Flow is your go-to countdown timer, designed to keep you focused without the fuss. Whether you’re brewing coffee, tackling a quick study session, or perfecting that soufflé, Time Flow’s intuitive interface and handy presets ensure you never lose track of precious minutes.

Key Features:

Quick Presets: One-click timers (5, 10, or 60 minutes) for instant setup.
Custom Durations: Need a different countdown? Set it in seconds.
Offline Functionality: Works like a charm even without internet.
Snooze & Reminders: Get notified when time’s up—and snooze if you need more.
Streamlined Design: Clean, modern interface for effortless use.

Stay in control and in the zone with Time Flow—the extension that helps you flow through your day, one perfect countdown at a time.
